3.eng-name: The Book of Menstruation and Istihadah

hadiths.text: Jumai' bin 'Umair said:"I entered upon 'Aishah with my mother and maternal aunt, and we asked her what the Prophet (ﷺ) used to do when one of (his wives) was menstruating. She said: He would tell us, when when of us menstruated, to wrap a wide Izar around herself then he would embrace her chest and breasts

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ مَا كَانَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم يَصْنَعُهُ إِذَا حَاضَتْ إِحْدَى نِسَائِهِ .
chapter.eng-name: What The Messenger Of Allah (ﷺ) Would Do When One Of His Wives Menstruated
